mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resume( resume_cd, login_id, resume_name, resume_regdate, resume_modidate )VALUES( #{resumeCd}, #{loginId}, #{resumeName}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_personal( resume_cd, personal_korname, personal_engname, personal_birthdate, personal_gender, personal_phone, personal_cellphone, personal_email, personal_sns, personal_addr ) VALUES ( #{resumeCd}, #{personalKorname}, #{personalEngname}, #{personalBirthdate}, #{personalGender}, #{personalPhone}, #{personalCellphone}, #{personalEmail}, #{personalSns}, #{personalAddr} )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_highschool( resume_cd, highschool_name, highschool_category, highschool_begindate, highschool_enddate ) VALUES ( #{resumeCd}, #{highschoolName}, #{highschoolCategory}, #{highschoolBegindate}, #{highschoolEnddate}, )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_university( resume_cd, university_name, university_category, university_begindate, university_enddate, university_major, university_dmajorminor, university_dmajorminorName, university_credit ) VALUES ( #{resumeCd}, #{universityName}, #{universityCategory}, #{universityBegindate}, #{universityEnddate}, #{universityMajor}, #{universityDmajorminor}, #{universityDmajorminorName}, #{universityCredit} )
